title: Diseases affecting Terrestrial Animals (No. 2) Regulations 2016 (Amendment)
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Notification and Control of
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Notification and Control of 
Diseases affecting Terrestrial Animals (No. 2) Regulations 2016 (Amendment) 
Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited notification control disease affecting terrestrial animal (no 2) regulation 2016 (amendment) regulation 2021

title: Diseases affecting Terrestrial Animals (No. 2) Regulations 2016 (Amendment)
heading: 2. The Notification and Control of Diseases affecting Terrestrial Animals
text_raw:
2. The Notification and Control of Diseases affecting Terrestrial Animals 
(No. 2) Regulations 2016 are amended, in Part B of the Schedule, by the 
insertion, between the mention of “Avian mycoplasmosis (caused by or 
involving Mycoplasma 
or 
Mycoplasma synovia)” and the mention of “Bovine viral diarrhoea”, of 
“Bovine besnoitiosis”. 

gallisepticum, Mycoplasma meleagridis 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

17 August, 2022. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 7th March, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [746] 3
text_norm: 2 notification control disease affecting terrestrial animal (no 2) regulation 2016 amended part b schedule insertion mention avian mycoplasmosis (caused involving mycoplasma mycoplasma synovia) mention bovine viral diarrhoea bovine besnoitiosis  gallisepticum mycoplasma meleagridis given official seal 17 august 2022 charlie mcconalogue minister agriculture food marine notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 7th march 2023 746 3

title: Diseases affecting Terrestrial Animals (No. 2) Regulations 2016 (Amendment)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations add Besnoitia to the list of animal diseases that are 
notifiable. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [746]
